code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./style.css";import"./form.css";import userIcon from"./Assets/user.svg";import lockIcon from"./Assets/lock.svg";import{Popup}from'./popup';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const LoginForm=props=>{const[userName,setUserName]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[errorPopup,setErrorPopup]=useState(false);function handleSubmit(e){e.preventDefault();console.log(userName);if(userName==="test@luxpmsoft.com"&&password==="test1234!"){console.log("connected");props.connection();}else{setErrorPopup(true);console.log("error");}}function closePopup(e){e.preventDefault();setErrorPopup(false);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"username",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"overlap-group-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"img",alt:"User",src:userIcon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:userName,onChange:e=>setUserName(e.target.value),type:"text",id:"userName",placeholder:"USERNAME",required:true})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"password",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"overlap-group-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"img",alt:"Lock",src:lockIcon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),type:"password",id:"password",placeholder:"PASSWORD",required:true})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"errorMessage",children:errorPopup?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{children:"Wrong combination"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"login-btn",onClick:handleSubmit,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login",children:"LOGIN"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Popup,{trigger:errorPopup,closePopup:closePopup,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"The provided password is wrong"})})]});};export default LoginForm;
